contest-event.event-date:
April 6, 1912 D Halifax Contest (Second Section)
Halifax Contest (Second Section) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Halifax Contest halifax-contest-second-section
None
Zoo Pleasure Grounds, Halifax, West Yorkshire 1st prize £5, the 'Aeolus' Cup, set of medals for best basses and a new pair of boots for the Conductor, 2nd prize £3, 3rd prize £2, 4th prize £1. 6 bands competed. Source - British Bandsman April 13,1912.
April 28, 2012, 6:44 a.m. Sept. 27, 2018, 10:12 a.m.
1 Copley and Skircoat Frank Shaw
2 Black Dyke Mills Junior Walter Halstead Grand Selection: Mendelssohn's Works [arr. Godfrey]
3 Southowram Subscription Phineas Ambler
4 Elland Silver Band L. Calverley
Unknown Result Denholme Mr Holmes
Unknown Result Clayton Subscription Rowland France
